title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Discus 2c Glider - version 1.0
description:
In this video we are going to look at the Discus 2c glider which has been released today for MSFS 2020. After looking from the exterior we will walkthrough the cockpit and take the glider out for a short flight.

If you also want to give this airport a try download your own copy from:
https://flightsim.to/file/25518/discus-2c-glider
